storyName: Among the Light and the Dust
storyInfo:
A corridor in Rhodes Island experiences a power outage, and Closure invites Kal'tsit to check the circuitry with her.
Under Closure's guidance, even Kal'tsit would confide some of her inner thoughts.

attributes.content: 11:30 A.M. \ Overcast
Countryside - Rhodes Island Chief Engineer's Office
What are you doing this time?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, you think I could see the Doctor for a bit?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Has it been too long since you pranked {@nickname}? Feeling antsy?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh come on! I'm really a very caring person.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Last time you called yourself a caring person, you set up a facility to broadcast 'Closure's Midnight Video Market' at twelve o'clock for three months straight.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We still have no way to turn the volume down.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Okay okay, I admit it! I want to go tease the Doctor.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Not to mention {@nickname}'s memory loss. I can't say for sure if the Doctor even knows who you are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh? Slept too much and turned stupid, huh? That's sad. I'll have to bring the Doctor some snacks as a little cheer-up gift.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Whatever. Just try not to make a bad impression.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Warfarin went bad enough. Add in the Doctor's misconceptions about vampires and the Kazdel matter will have to be postponed. Indefinitely.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is an opportunity to rehabilitate yourself in the eyes of the people. Seize it well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do I really need rehabilitating?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: After the time you set the climate control system to 36 degrees, yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That was a power outage in the machine shop.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We found your fingerprints on the console.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It was a power outage in the machine shop!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You hacked the surveillance system and deleted the recording, but the console served as a biological backup. I have thirteen tissue samples from thirteen different instances.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm sorry it's my bad that envoy is such an arrogant prick I just want to rub his nose in it sorry.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Anyway, the welcome party. Dr. {@nickname}'s welcome back party. We're not throwing one?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Afraid not. Circumstances such as they are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey, why you gotta be like that, Kal'tsit? This is the Doctor we're talking about, the Doctor with amensia. We gotta create an atmosphere of warmth and camaraderie.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did you always look at the Doctor so?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Maybe... I've never been that close to the Doctor. But didn't you just say this is the perfect time to make a good impression?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure, let's talk about something else.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph. If you're not going, I'll go myself. I don't care what you do.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did I hear we're going to Lungmen? I think that was on the schedule.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And we can operate freely?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Lungmen has become quite dangerous.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh? Really? Lungmen? I thought that place was all about law and order.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's the closest city to Chernobog. That should be pretty self-explanatory.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So why are we going?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Because it's the closest city to Chernobog.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I think you're hiding something...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No. I said everything there is to be said in the last meeting. Right about the time you were slumped back in your chair, wearing an eye mask, fast asleep.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What can I say? Keeping this operation well maintained is tiring work.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I never said I blamed you. Without you, Rhodes Island wouldn't even get off the ground.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I still want to do away with your suspicions... What is it you called me in for, exactly?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What? I can't just call up an old friend?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll be in my lab.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey! Wait! Okay... we have a power outage down two corridors in sector three.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Can you come look at the cables with me?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just send an engineer down there. Is it a problem with the power supply cables?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or the two of us could go look ourselves.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Whenever I ask you for an inspection, you always delegate it to another operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My sense of responsibility as Chief Engineer of Rhodes Island has suddenly awakened! Let's go!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Come on, keep up with me...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This is Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh. Heavyrain?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hello, Miss Closure.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What a good little girl! Look, Kal'tsit, look how much more likable she is than you!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heavyrain, let me see your monitor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This one...? On my left arm here?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Yes. Be careful not to touch the needle.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: ...Numbers look good. Your hemoglobin is up. You're recovering well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: No thanks necessary. Just doing my job. You don't thank people for that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You know the way back, Heavyrain?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then you show yourself out. Closure and I have something to take care of.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I'm a guard. If I go, will you be okay, Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You may be mistaken, Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I asked you to come with us just to give you a the layout of the ship. You may not come here often in the future.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't need protection.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then, excuse me. Goodbye, Miss Closure.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Yeah, bye.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did you hear that, Kal'tsit? She called me 'Miss!' Oh what a good little girl...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: She really seemed to want to help you out. And you sent her away like that?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Every operator has to find her own place in the world, just like me. Having her waste time with things she's not good at doesn't help anybody.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Would it kill you to talk like a human being every once in a while?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Heavyrain was in the Sargon military.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Before she can establish interpersonal relationships, she needs to find a proper position for herself and integrate into Rhodes Island. That requires both support and tolerance, as well as her own self-awareness.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah yeah, your lectures make my head hurt.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: She another one of your strays you brought home?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You kind of have a talent for picking up new pets, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How many are we up to now?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's one of the steps in the 'Acquisition and Cultivation Procedures for Infected Personnel.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hold on... Last month, you had a solid 72-hour surgical procedure. Was that her you were operating on?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The surgical team went through like eight or nine shifts, but you didn't sleep for three days?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: At least she recovered quickly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tell me, Kal'tsit, do you drug yourself?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I refuse to answer that question.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If I don't ask, you'll never say, will you?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What's the point of discussing this?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're too hard on yourself.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I can handle it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dark!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Should we be using backup power?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You can't see?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm a vampire, of course I can see.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So can I.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All right then, on we go.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Now I know what I just said, but did I step on something?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Augh! Wh- what is this!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Nothing to get all upset about...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is that... a gachapon machine? What's it doing here?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh. 'Furry Friends Collection. 12 different furry friends to...' Wow, secret level! Awesome!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Clo-sure!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I worked in a dark pipeline like this. I really missed it.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And Rhodes Island wasn't nearly this big back then.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Spanner, please!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Thanks, Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can't reach it. Can you give me a boost so I can fix the cable?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oof... This whole area has been totally cut off from the power supply. We can start troubleshooting.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, do you think it was a mistake to go to Chernobog and rescue the Doctor?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It was certainly unwise to enter Chernobog at that time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Amiya was very firm in her decision. No one could sway her. And you know how the elite operators are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It only happened because you abstained.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm starting to think this was some kind of test of Amiya?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Test? No, not a test. Or rather if it was a test, it wasn't me administering it. It was the situation she found herself in.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But as firmly as she believed in that decision, I could only support her... Though I certainly didn't have to make her feel like it would all go smoothly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Her choice is her choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well said. But you're the one who has to deal with the consequences. Aren't you tired...?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Nobody gets it all right from beginning to end, Closure. Not even me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But we made it through the darkness. Now we just wait for the light at the end of the tunnel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Also, that second cable right above your head is about to fall.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey hey hey! Hold me steady! If the three-pin power connector drops, that's the end of both of us.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Okay, hold up, I'm laying out the wire.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did you just stuff two whole sets of wires in behind them?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shhh! I must feel the thrum of the electricity in my own heart, to achieve peace and balance with the current.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I advise you to mull over what you just said.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But, Kal'tsit... Oh, should be good. Try the switch.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I was saying, regardless of what kind of riddle you were just playing at, if you're walking in the dark, you need some kind of light, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Aren't we fixing the lights right now?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah, there we go.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why are you asking me about these things?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Because if I don't ask, you don't tell.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You let it all well up inside you until you go crazy.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So my answers don't even matter to you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I think all these things you told me are reeeeeeaaally important, to you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So yeah it's not that important what you say... but it's really super important that you say it, and I hear it with my own two ears.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What a waste of time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Next time I'll just hand you the written report.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But then you wouldn't come with me.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Says who?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As long as you really have some lights that need fixing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Promise?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How is it I always end up making some strange, inexplicable deal with you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's what an engineer does!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Here, Kal'tsit, take a look at this light bulb.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's very clear?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah, clear!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If only you were like this all the time, I'd be a lot less tense.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If only...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Woah! Shut up! Don't say it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just be quiet... and enjoy this little light together.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It really is a nice, gentle light.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
